verses.name: Lamentations 3:22
verses.text: It is of the Lord’s mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:23
verses.text: They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:24
verses.text: The Lord is my portion, saith my soul; therefore will I hope in him.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:25
verses.text: The Lord is good unto them that wait for him, to the soul that seeketh him.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:26
verses.text: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the Lord.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:27
verses.text: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:28
verses.text: He sitteth alone and keepeth silence, because he hath borne it upon him.
